text: In this production I can say that is quite well organized and people is talented. Our Environment team has always been ahead of 3/4 weeks compared to the Layout team that comes after us. Sometimes it can happen because of deadlines. In my previous job was a nightmare as we were overloaded of work and managers didn’t care about the artists. But here in Blue Zoo was much much better. To be fair I don’t do a lot of real life drawing as I would! But generally I go to coffee places or museums! I literally went three times to the Maritime Museum in Greenwich to sketch the objects! was amazing I suggest you to go as well. You can learn alot without thinking ‘what can I do now?’ I will do more with summer. I love pencil and ink sketches but also I’m practicing more with gouache!
I have loads of book to recommend! I’ll check better tomorrow on my mac so I can tell exactly which one is good for what area!
ps. if you go to Forbidden Planet they have an area with books they want to get rid of and you can find really good artbooks as well!
